title: AudioNotes â€“ Easily record and share audio messages from your mac menubar
author: hitdelete
content: hey is always i imagined real mvp landing page :)audionotes (download free) is macos menu bar app helps record share audio messages really easily. you finish recording, app instantly copies link paste emails, forums, website comments social media.why? unlike text, audio emphasises message... spending days typing sucks too.hope enjoy!cheers,rob@hitdeleteps. join audionotes mailing list feature updatespps. made audionote the above
